captions.en: Sapiens Research.  Software for creating transparent research papers from top to bottom.
There are more and more problems surfacing in the research field. Problems about questionable paper reviews, about unfair attributions or about dubious scientific results.
Our software will have tools for data storage, management and analysis, which could also determine in a semiautomatic way if the quality of the paper is acceptable.
Transparent collaboration tools between contributors and other people invited to take part.
Transparent decision making with attribution, transparent meeting scheduling.
We want to make research transparent and meritocratic.
Also, we will link it to our other projects: subject dot raw, dataverse.
This system will be able to automatically give credit to its collaborators, based in their work.

Everyone deserves the same chance for making quality research, regardless of country, affiliation, or private reviewers.  We believe that research papers should be made open for everyone to peer-review.
